Summary: The course agenda for the SRSD course from January 13-15, 2025 includes instruction and workshops on spatial sensing and reasoning from sensor data, led by instructor Tian Jing. The first day will cover an introduction to spatial sensing, with the following days focusing on spatial reasoning and workshops for each topic. The final day, led by instructor Xie Zhen, will cover spatial recognition and case studies with a workshop on applied spatial sensing and reasoning. A written test will also be administered on the final day.
